channel.title: The Scott and Pam Rock Alternative Metal Radio Show
channel.description:
Check out our internet Indie Rock Alternative Metal radio shows live World Wide, Syndicated and Simultaneously Broadcast on Saturdays, 2-6PM PST, 3-7PM MST, 4-8PM CST and 5-9PM EST. Featuring Great Indie Rock bands, Indie Alternative bands and Indie Metal bands.Visit our myspace page for our scheduling and list of stations that support our show at: http://myspace.com/thescottandpamradioshow Find updates and scheduled events at: http://scottandpamradioshow.com
Listen in on Saturdays at: http://cayaradio.com http://cygnusradio.com http://darkcloudradio.net http://garageradio.com http://getampedradio.com http://k94rocks.com http://netrock101.com http://nvasionradio.com http://v-m-u.com http://wflmradio.com http://wirnonline.com http://wykkydbruradio.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: One Wild and Crazy Kick Ass Alternative Rock, Hard Rock and New Metal Radio Show!

item.title: Part 1 of 4 8/11/07 Live Broadcast of The Scott and Pam Indie Alternative Rock Metal Radio Show
item.description:
Part 1 of 4 of the 8/11/07 Live Broadcast of the Scott and Pam Indie Alternative Rock Metal Radio Show. Featuring the Best in Indie and Unsigned Bands of Alterntaive Rock, Hard Rock and Metal Music. You can listen to our Live Shows every Saturday, 2-6PM PST, 3-7PM MST, 4-8PM CST, and 5-9PM EST. We bring you Great Rock Hard Rock Metal and Alternative Indie Bands, Live Interviews, Great Humor and Fun! If you love to laugh and have a sense of humor, you'll love this show as we take EVERYTHING to the EDGE while bringing you GREAT Music. Join us on air live on Saturdays. Visit our myspace page at:
Scott & Pam Myspace
For updates and scheduled events see our home page
Scott and Pam Radio Show Official
Listen in on Saturdays at:
Caya Radio
Cygnus Radio
Dark Cloud Radio
Garage Radio
Get Amped Radio
K 94 Rocks Radio
Net Rock 101 Radio
NVasion Radio
V.M. Underground Radio
WFLM Radio
World Internet Radio Network
WYKKYD BRU Radio

item.description:
